methods.name: void onConnectionFailed(@NonNull WifiNetworkSpecifier wifiNetworkSpecifier, @LocalOnlyConnectionStatusCode int failureReason)
methods.comment:
* Called when the framework attempted to connect to a local-only network requested by the
         * registering app, but the connection to the network failed.
         * @param wifiNetworkSpecifier The {@link WifiNetworkSpecifier} which failed to connect.
         * @param failureReason the connection failure reason code.

methodNames: void onConnectionFailed(@NonNull WifiNetworkSpecifier wifiNetworkSpecifier, @LocalOnlyConnectionStatusCode int failureReason)
